TopicTitle: Hit mach 7 under 30km and the computer auto changed to orbital view (SSTO)

Articles.Content:
Craft File: https://www.dropbox.com/s/56wa9rhbisgtai8/MACHER%202.craft

Mods: Pwings, kosmos, b9 (oh, and mech Jeb per always)

Pretty sure this thing can go to Duna and back no problem.

Also I hope 9 inlets for 4 engines doesn't count as intake abuse... they're all on different spots at least.

Edited December 16, 2013 by horndgmium

That is not intake abuse, not by a day'n sight.

The only thing I see that could be a problem, is the turbojets quit producing power around mach 4.9.

I can't test it becuase I don't have Mechjeb or Kosmos, but it looks quite good.

That is not intake abuse, not by a day'n sight.

The only thing I see that could be a problem, is the turbojets quit producing power around mach 4.9.

I can't test it becuase I don't have Mechjeb or Kosmos, but it looks quite good.

Turbojets stop producing thrust at 2,400 m/s , which is actually around mach 6.7 but in this case that is still an issue
Nice plane! Does it fly with FAR?
Yes sir! It's actually really stable and maneuverable up to about 500 m/s, then unstable again until about 900 m/s, then even more stable than before (usually by that point I'm using RCS though).
Clear intake abuse, but that only matters if you want it to matter.
